name: ModME
description:
This game was created in under 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

ModME is a special robot who can plug modules into himself. These modules can change how fast he moves or how gravity effects him. The only catch is - once two modules get plugged in, they link together. ModME can only hold two modules at a time though, so choose your modules carefully! Combine speed with gravity to jump higher - but only when moving quickly - and many other fun combinations in this puzzle-platformer.

Shout out to https://ambientcg.com/ for some of the textures used in this game.
